items.name: Map Service test
items.getRecordsTemplate: <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" outputFormat="application/xml" version="2.0.2" service="CSW" resultType="results" startPosition="{startPosition}" maxRecords="1000" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/csw/2.0.2/CSW-discovery.xsd"><csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"><csw:ElementSetName>full</csw:ElementSetName></csw:Query></csw:GetRecords>
